Label: Onboarding Stage
Description: Current stage of the onboarding process

Label: Kickoff Date
Description: Date of the project kickoff meeting

Label: Approval Authority Name
Description: Name of the client's approval authority

Label: Approval Authority Email
Description: Email of the client's approval authority

Label: Data Intake Status
Description: Status of data collection from client

Label: Weekly Standup Day
Description: Day of week for standup meetings

Label: Pilot Duration (Weeks)
Description: Duration of pilot program in weeks

Label: Success Criteria Met
Description: Whether success criteria have been met

Label: UAT Complete
Description: Whether User Acceptance Testing is complete

Label: Last Status Update
Description: Date and time of last status update

Label: Budget Variance
Description: Difference between budget and actual costs
